timeline.bodyText:
As I understand from code the test checks when left operand is TINYINT type and the right is one of "everything else" types.
I'd suggest either rename testTinyint into testLeftTinyint_rightOtherTypes or split into separate test methods per each case like.

testTinyintAndNull
testTinyintAndTinyint
... and so on.
second approach adds readability of what tests check but number of methods will blow
timeline.author: alex-dukhno
